SEARCH
Package koopa.core.sources

Interface Source

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsReplacing, BashStyleComments, BasicSource, ChainingSource, CompilerDirectives, ContinuationOfLines, CopyInclude, InlineComments, LineSplitter, ListSource, LOCCount, NullSource, Pipe, Printing, ProgramArea, Replace, Replacing, StackOfSources, TagAll, TokenSeparator, TreeSource
public interface Source
This is the counterpart to Targets. They provide a place where Data comes from. During parsing we will basically be taking data from a Source, transforming it, and passing it to a Target.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Close this source, giving it a chance to clean up any resources.
    <S extends Source>
    S
    getSource(Class<S> clazz)
    If this is a source of a matching class type, return this.
    Data
    next()
    Get the next data item.
    void
    unshift(Data packet)
    Return a piece of data to this source, so that it becomes available again to be read.

  • Method Details

    • next

      Data next()
      Get the next data item. Or null if there are no more.

    • unshift

      void unshift(Data packet)
      Return a piece of data to this source, so that it becomes available again to be read. This is basically an "undo" option for next().

    • close

      void close()
      Close this source, giving it a chance to clean up any resources. Any further requests from next() should return null.

    • getSource

      <S extends Source> S getSource(Class<S> clazz)
      If this is a source of a matching class type, return this. If not, look for it upstream.
